church.name: Church of Gods Prophecy
church.address: Balanga II, B del Mundo, Mansalay Oriental Mindoro

reception.name: Maestro Residence
reception.address: Balanga I, B del Mundo, Mansalay Oriental Mindoro

event.dressCode: We would love to see our guests in white to match the celebration, but please feel free to wear whatever you are most comfortable in. Your presence matters more than your outfit.

invitation.subtitle: You're Invited
invitation.heading: A Letter From Our Hearts
invitation.message:
With hearts overflowing with love and gratitude, we warmly invite you to join us in celebrating the Christening of our beloved daughter, Xenia.

This sacred milestone marks the beginning of her beautiful spiritual journey, and it would mean so much to us to have you witness and share in this special day.

Your presence, prayers, and love will make this celebration even more meaningful as we entrust our little one to God's grace and guidance.
invitation.blessing: We look forward to celebrating this joyful and blessed occasion with you.

parentsMessage.subtitle: Parents Message
parentsMessage.heading: With Gratitude and Love
parentsMessage.message:
With grateful hearts, we thank you for celebrating this special day with our family.Your presence, prayers, and love for Xenia truly mean everything to us.

We kindly share that your presence is already the greatest gift. We humbly ask that no cash gifts be given. If you choose to bring a small gift for Xenia, we will really appreciate that. We understand that life can be challenging, and simply being here to share this joyful moment is more than enough.

Thank you for your love and support.

meta.title: Xenia Gail's Christening Celebration
meta.description: You are warmly invited to celebrate the Christening of Xenia Gail. Join us for this blessed occasion.
